structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Judges And Registers Of Probate And Insolvency

law.catch_line: Hampden Probate Court; Deputy Assistant Registers
law.text: The register of the Hampden probate court may, with the approval of the chief justice of the probate and family court, designate 6 employees as deputy assistant registers with the same powers as assistant registers and with the approval of the chief justice remove a deputy assistant register. The deputy assistant registers shall receive additional compensation of $6,000.
